markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Caller](/Feats.aspx?ID=331) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 136 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery. Add [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), and [_veil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=355) to your spell list as primal spells.
name: Fey Caller
